div.h1: Texas Preparatory Schools are tuition-free charter schools that prepare the whole child through a diverse program for grades K-6th. We now serve Central Texas with two conveniently located campuses in Austin and San Marcos.

blockquote.q: “5 out of 7 of my grandchildren attend Texas Prep and they have all excelled academically”
“I trust TPS with the care, safety, and academic teaching of my children”
“My son is in Kindergarten and he wakes up every morning excited to go to school”
“Best school ever – love the small classes and after school program.”
“The teachers are always keeping in touch with the parents and my kids love this school.”
“My grandson has improved his grades tremendously.”
